subject: Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Football (College)
Polls and Public Opinion
lead_paragraph: Louisiana State, which absorbed a lopsided loss against Alabama in the Bowl Championship Series national title game last January, was ranked No. 1 in the USA Today top 25 coaches’ poll.
